title: 服务器原版的成就和死亡信息去掉的插件
author: 钻石梦想

replies.author: Misaka。
replies.txt_content:
嗯  是插件端吗  如果是插件端 切有ess基础插件的话
取消成就
Server.properties 里面把 announce-player-achievements=true 改为announce-player-achievements=false

取消死亡信息
Ess配置文件config里 把death-messages: true 改为 death-messages: false

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule announceAdvancements false
/gamerule showDeathMessages false

即可

replies.author: AzureHanChen
replies.txt_content:
在服务器后台输入
(OP输入有几率重启后失效)
gamerule announceAdvancements false
gamerule showDeathMessages false
